translations: 副牧师的职务；助理牧师的身份

sentences.sentence: Results Overall diagnostic ac- curacy of ultrasonography was 95 %.
sentences.translation: 结果：本组超声诊断符合率95％。

sentences.sentence: The projectors distinguish themselves by high ac curacy of repetition and stability of projection.
sentences.translation: 该投影仪以其重复出现的高准确率及投影的稳定性而著称。

sentences.sentence: It is shown that the ac-curacy of our formulas is still very high even if the optical power density is large.
sentences.translation: 结果表明，即使光功率密度很大，我们公式的精度仍很高。
